title: StellarCosm
description: StellarCosm; A galactic portmanteau of Product Design, Job Satisfaction, and Companionship.In a nutshell - New technology throws several galactic enterprises into turmoil, triggering a chain of events no-one ever expected.In this exciting work of long-form concrete prose, Dov Spinks explores the themes of design and technology, all the while orbiting the pedestrian aspects of everyday life in space.
author: Dov Spinks
